alert.note: Alert for Dunn (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:25PM CDT until July 29 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dunn County in southwestern North Dakota... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Killdeer, or 31 miles southeast of Watford City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mckenzie Bay Recreation Area around 910 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Oakdale, Skunk Creek Bay Recreation Area, Little Missouri State Park and Fort Berthold. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
